data.name: PolyRoyale
data.detailed_description:
WITTE'S STUDIO - GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1524630/KeepUp_Survival/


About the Game


JUMP, LAND, FIGHT!

Play on small selectable PolyRoyale maps with a small number of players. You fight against bots and players as solo, duo or squad. Various weapons will help you survive. Choose a suitable look for your player character at the beginning. Be ready and jump out of a plane and fly through the air looking for a good place to land. And show that you can be a survivor. Only one can win!

And be careful, you are trapped in a big cylinder that is getting smaller and smaller and gradually changing its location!

Info:
- AI bots
- Mode: Solo, Duo, Squad
- Different weapons
- Different characters
- Three different maps
- A small number of vehicles
- Number of players self selectable

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core / Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 940 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: AMD FX Six Core / Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Contains violence and gory scenes that may not be suitable for all audiences or ages.
